name: squat-apps
description: Welcome to the Fit Hub App Automation Testing repository. This repository is dedicated to maintaining and executing automated test scripts for the Fit Hub application, ensuring high-quality standards for both iOS and Android platforms.

scripts.retest:android: allure generate allure-results -o allure-outputs --clean && node scripts/tc_failed_parser.js && cd android && npm run wdio:retest
scripts.retest:ios: allure generate allure-results -o allure-outputs --clean && node scripts/tc_failed_parser.js && cd ios && npm run wdio:retest
